short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: New Tab Master - A new search experience

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
New Tab Master. We are 100% Free! 

Search the web, and get your results fast

New Tab Master - Light and minimal new tab that allows you to search quickly, navigate easily to your top visited sites as well as to popular utilities web sites. 
The search features use within the extension will be provided by Microsoft Bing; however, the extension will not make any changes in your default browser search setting.
By installing the New Tab Master Chrome extension you agree to install this application, and you agree to the End User License Agreement and the Privacy Policy. 
End User License Agreement - https://www.tab-master.com/trms
Privacy Policy - https://www.tab-master.com/pp

How to remove this extension from your Chrome?
You can open your Chrome browser’s Settings and find our extension in the Extensions page. Click on the “Remove” button and it will be completely removed. Alternatively, you can right-click on the extension’s icon on your browser, select “Remove from Chrome” from the drop-down menu.  

Please leave us a 5 start review!
